name: Under five mortality rate - UN World Population Prospects (2015)
title: Under five mortality rate - UN World Population Prospects (2015)
description:
– The original data is presented in deaths per 1,000 live births. Here it is changed to percentages by dividing the original estimates by 100.

– Importantly data refer to 5 year intervals preceding the indicated year. E.g. 1955 refers to 1950-1955 in the original dataset.

sources.name: UN World Population Prospects (2015)
sources.dataPublishedBy: United Nations, Department of Economic and Social Affairs, Population Division (2015). World Population Prospects: The 2015 Revision, custom data acquired via website.
sources.dataPublisherSource: Various, including censuses, vital registrations and maternity histories. Full source information can be found here: https://esa.un.org/unpd/wpp/DataSources/
sources.additionalInfo:
– The original data is presented in deaths per 1,000 live births. Here it is changed to percentages by dividing the original estimates by 100.

– Importantly data refer to 5 year intervals preceding the indicated year. E.g. 1955 refers to 1950-1955 in the original dataset.
